short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A powerful and customizable extension that harnesses the power of AI to automatically summarize the readable content of any webpage.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: TLDR with GPT is a convenient web browser extension specifically crafted to save time by generating brief summaries of news articles and other online content.  Leveraging the advanced capabilities of GPT, this tool adeptly extracts and condenses vital information, enabling users to quickly extract the juice from online content without delving into extensive text. Equipped with customizable summary modes and content translation options, TLDR with GPT is an ideal time-saving solution for busy individuals who need to stay informed on current events and trending topics.
